website_summaries.verdict: Durable, nice looking, and practical – this wooden spoon has a lot going for it, including an impressive warranty. Made by a top brand in kitchen products.
pros: Constructed by KitchenAid, a highly respected brand
Made of solid cherry wood that does a good job holding up to repeated use and moisture exposure
Backed by a one-year replacement and limited lifetime warranty
cons: Holds up best with hand washing
Thick design makes it a bit awkward to use on some foods
but the upside is that it's also quite sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace a cheap wooden spoon I had before, which picked up stains from every meal I'd cook. This spoon answered my needs because since it's dark, I don't expect it to discolor as easy. It also feels very solid in my hands and it looks like it'll be useful for years to come. The only thing I don't like is the metal loop, I wish it was easier to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite spoons
customer_reviews.text: I busted my last cheap alderwood spoon the other day and decided to get a macho cooking spoon. It doesn't help my cook batter but I like using it a lot more then the little wood spoons you get at the grocery. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Thicker thanI thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and well made. It is a little thicker than I like for turning fried eggs. For heavier foods it works excellent. It is recommended hand wash only. It's not my first choice since getting it and seeing the thickness of it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas N. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooking spoons. Just don’t drop them in the floor because the wood will chip off.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love the KitchenAid brand and so far this spatula has ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the KitchenAid brand and so far this spatula has worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, sturdy spoons. Though any food safe hardwood would have sufficed, the cherrywood makes for beautiful spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Patty E.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kitchen spoon
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year now. Very nice kitchen spoon.
customer_reviews.author: bg

customer_reviews.title: Good looking/quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the whole set, needed to upgrade my wooden utensils from 7 years ago. Looks very nice and not cheap looking. Pretty heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: ARose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a slotted spoon - solid and nice finish - no issues - recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David Markley

customer_reviews.title: not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I got the stirring spoon after my second similar shape silicone spoon broke. The KitchenAid spoon is functional, too, it is soft enough not to damage my non-stick pans. I love stirring spoons with a hole in the middle, it helps with stirring quite a lot. I wish the handle was a bit thicker so it will be easier to stir thick foods. It requires hand washing, but I disregard this advice and wash it in the dishwasher because I am too lazy and because I want it to be sterilized. The color did change some, but the structure is still sound.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like wood this is part of a good set.
customer_reviews.text: This complets my cherry wood set. I like the wood for cooking. This one is good for gravy in a cast iron skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good working spoon
customer_reviews.text: I don't love the ring on the end, but it works well and the wood looks good. Make sure you oil it and don't wash it in the dishwasher. Because of the thickness, it is hard to clean between the slots if you let things dry on.
customer_reviews.author: TallDenverite

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and solid, haven't used it yet, but wood is great to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Peters

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wooden tools are always bets for stainless and Teflon cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Peters

customer_reviews.title: Thick as a brick!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy but to thick to be able to turn eggs or pancakes. Works good for swatting flies!
customer_reviews.author: JMAZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and solid, haven't used it yet, but wood is great to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Peters

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid spoon
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid hardwood spoon with a good shape. Not a fan of the metal hanging hook, but that came off with a pair of pliers. Suggest washing with soap and water, letting dry, and then oiling with mineral oil before first use. Price is a little high if you don't get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Hansen

product_meta.title: KitchenAid Gourmet Cherry Wood Basting Spoon
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Basting SpoonThis KitchenAid Gourmet Cherry Wood Basting Spoon is perfect for stirring and dishing out gravies, soups, stews, liquid dishes, dressings, and sauces. The basting spoon is packaged individually. The entire basting spoon is constructed of cherry wood for comfort and durability. The basting spoon is safe to use on all cookware, including nonstick. A large basting spoon head allows for easy food preparation or serving. A convenient hanging hole ensures space-saving storage. Hand-wash only. 
One year hassle-free replacement and lifetime limited warranty. This fine product is warranted to be free from defects in material and workmanship. For one year from date of purchase, under normal use and care, KitchenAid will replace these products free of charge, if they are found to be defective in material or workmanship. In addition, from year two through the life of the products, any piece found to be defective under conditions of normal use and care will be repaired at no charge or replaced with the same item or an item of equal or better value. For more information call the KitchenAid Customer Satisfaction Center toll-free at 1-800-541-6390 or visit our web site at www.KitchenAid.com.
feature_bullets: The entire basting spoon is constructed of cherry wood for comfort and durability
The basting spoon is safe to use on all cookware, including nonstick
A large basting spoon head allows for easy food preparation or serving
A convenient hanging hole ensures space-saving storage
